name: Ever 17 - The Out of Infinity [SDC]
description:
Ever 17: Out of Infinity is an adventure game developed by KID. It came out on 20-12-2005. Hirameki International Group published the game. The game is rated as "Exceptional" on RAWG.
Ever 17: Out of Infinity is available on PC.
Takumi Nakazawa directed the game. Takeshi Abo scored the game.
